channel.title: [317] Adding portals
channel.description:
Can anyone help me out here? I'm trying to add some portals for my 317 server but can't seem to find a guide on it. Every time I add objects via object.cfg they don't show up. What am I doing wrong?
By the way, I realize that just adding the portal to object.cfg won't make it teleport me anywhere.

item.title: [317] Adding portals
item.dc:creator: @mangalover51 mangalover51
item.description:
@mangalover51 wrote:

suppose to be in client.java… that’s it…under this

    public void NewObjects() {

makeGlobalObject(2734, 3471, 4877, -1, 10); // magic stall ::thieve makeGlobalObject(2743, 3469, 2565, -2, 10); // silver stall ::thieve makeGlobalObject(2739, 3472, 2560, -2, 10); // silk stall ::thieve makeGlobalObject(2768, 2756, 362, -3, 10); // barrel froze testing makeGlobalObject(2043, 4535, 2472, 0, 10); // portal at home for ::adminzone
as you can see admin portal there this is 317…

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Adding portals
item.dc:creator: @owner_alex1 owner alex1
item.description:
@owner_alex1 wrote:

makeGlobalObject(xcords, ycords, id of object, -1, 10);//portal

in client.java

item.title: [317] Adding portals
item.dc:creator: @Motokid126 Motokid126
item.description:
@Motokid126 wrote:

go to the server side, not client and click on ‘client.java’ then search for this ‘makeGlobalObject’ then add it

item.title: [317] Adding portals
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“2kScape, post:1, topic:334139”]Can anyone help me out here? I’m trying to add some portals for my 317 server but can’t seem to find a guide on it. Every time I add objects via object.cfg they don’t show up. What am I doing wrong?

By the way, I realize that just adding the portal to object.cfg won’t make it teleport me anywhere.[/quote]

You at it into. makeglobalobject.

To make it teleport you make it like

if(####){
toY == 5423;
toX == 5351;
)

Read full topic
